title: Kled says what's in the mind of all League players
body: "Just because they're on our team doesn't mean we can trust them!"

replies.body: Sure we can. I trust my team to feed every game. I trust them to throw at baron if we reach 40 minutes. I trust them to build poorly. For all these things, in team we trust.
nashor, rageblad twistedfate incomming
Now I want to try that.
Dangerous as hell to play because of his low AA range, be careful.
That's why you then go for Rapidfire canon. :D Problem solved.
"I Hate You!!!!"

rito logic
shows how shittty there system is and how hypocritcal they can be
Isn't the main difference is that Kled is a character in a game, who has no harmful intention to other PLAYERS.

Use quote marks. If you get in trouble, just tell Riot you were quoting the champion. They'll either have to accept the mistake and free you, or they'll  keep you there and you'll be a shining example of Riot's hypocrite actions. No matter what, you win... in a way.
